alert.note: Alert for Alcona; Alpena; Cheboygan; Iosco; Mackinac Island, Bois Blanc Island; Presque Isle (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued January 12 at 9:55PM EST until January 13 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Gaylord
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches, resulting in total snow accumulations of 8 to 14 inches. Frequent wind gusts of 35 to 45 mph through tonight, especially near the Lake Huron shoreline. * WHERE...Portions of Eastern Upper and Northern Lower Michigan. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Widespread blowing snow is expected to lead to significantly reduced visibilities for several hours. Significant drifting may lead to some impassible secondary roadways. Strong winds could cause tree damage and result in power outages.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Alcona; Alpena; Cheboygan; Iosco; Mackinac Island, Bois Blanc Island; Presque Isle
